name: Catch The Kite
description:
Catch the flying Kite.

Is a platformer made for a jam. The goal is to catch the Kite and skillfully avoid the obstacles

If it's too hard for you, let me know, as everyone knows, it's totally subjective. If you master all the obstacles smoothly, you are sure to catch the kite.

A few bugs are still present, but I will take care of them later, they don't have too much influence on the game.
